text:
M. Sankaran (62) of Thavanai, who worked for a private security agency, was allegedly beaten to death at Ganapathy Mill Colony under Thatchanallur police limits on Sunday.

Enmity grew between Sankaran and P. Esakki alias Esakkipandi, a security guard, over deploying him for duty, sources said. Irked over his attitude, Esakkipandi hit Sankaran’s head with a rod and he died. Based on a complaint lodged by Shenbagam (65), brother of the deceased, Thatchanallur police filed a case.
title: Man beaten to death
